snippet.title: RIVR | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy now on Oculus Store:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/gear-vr/1301475866564867/

RIVR is a colorful and fast-paced VR runner experience. Use your skill and your color shifting abilities to run as far as you can and explore different worlds.

- RUN THROUGH THE HILLS
Sprint through grasscovered hills, green swamps and frozen peaks.

- A CHANGING WORLD
Change the world with the tip of your finger. Shift between dimensions to pass through objects and get as far as possible.

- HOW FAR CAN YOU GET?
Compete to see how far you can get. Try to get as far as possible and run toward the light at the horizon, and beyond.

-

Oculus Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/gear-vr/1301475866564867/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RIVRgame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LoneHeroStudios
Google+: https://plus.google.com/100031871043047946886

-

RIVR is developed by Lone Hero Studios

http://loneherostudios.com/
